mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ui_element_group( group_name, description, element_count, created_by, created_at ) VALUES ( #{groupName}, #{description}, #{elementCount}, #{createdBy}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ui_element_group SET element_count = #{count}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, group_name AS groupName, description, element_count AS elementCount, created_by AS createdBy, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM ui_element_group WHERE id = #{id}
